Use this data source to access information about an existing Firewall Policy.

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Azure = Pulumi.Azure;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = Output.Create(Azure.Network.GetFirewallPolicy.InvokeAsync(new Azure.Network.GetFirewallPolicyArgs
        {
            Name = "existing",
            ResourceGroupName = "existing",
        }));
        this.Id = example.Apply(example => example.Id);
    }

    [Output("id")]
    public Output<string> Id { get; set; }
}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure/sdk/v3/go/azure/network"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		example, err := network.LookupFirewallPolicy(ctx, &network.LookupFirewallPolicyArgs{
			Name:              "existing",
			ResourceGroupName: "existing",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		ctx.Export("id", example.Id)
		return nil
	})
}
```

{{% /example %}}
